1.content:
It has been a long while going through the ocean, but you found it. The Lakefar continent, an unknown place where people have come there, but never came back for some reason. You are a brave adventurer, looking for some epicness. You managed to hit the beach with your kayak. You got off and you look around, it is a wonderful place indeed. You start to look around the place, until you spotted a Lagiacrus. You hide behind a bush, observing it while it appears to bathe in the water. But there's something different about that Lagiacrus no one has ever seen. It appears to be very human like, an anthro!? You can tell it is a female due to it's breast. The Lagiacrus sees you in her sight. Worried, you run away. It doesn't seem to follow you, but you shouldn't take any chances. So you entered the wilderness to search for how the people who dared enter the continent got lost.

Anyway, which gender are you?
1.title: Land Ho!

11.content: As a male, other male monsters can rape you to become that monster faster. Which monster do you want to be?
11.title: The Bad Boys!

111.content: Your name is Ryan, an adventurer with the bravery of a German Shepard. You go to a place what appears to be a mountain. You go further to see a large shadow above the ground. You look up to see a Rathalos circling above you. You try to avoid it but it was too late as it pinned you to the ground. The Rathalos made a low growl, wanting to know what to do with you. After a few seconds later you get...
111.title: Ryan's Deadly Fate

113.content: Your name is Brock. A young lad, about 17 years old, who likes going on daring adventures. You are also a fan of vorephillia, which is unlikely to most people. You entered a forest full of lush green plants. You then find some duck/dodo-like creatures called Gargwa. Interested, you sit on a log and you started to observe them. It appears to be mating season due to the fact that the Gargwa's are, well, mating. You were just doing your business until a lone Gargwa tried to mate with you. "Hey! What are you doing?" You said as you got out of his way. "You really shouldn't be doing that to other things you know." you said to the Gargwa all depressed. Suddenly, you and the Gargwas hear a loud howl. The Gargwas started to panic and run away. Suddenly, a large beast comes out of nowhere and attacks the Gargwa that almost raped you! The beast then starts to devour the poor, unconscious Gargwa. You heard of this predator one time but you have never seen, the Zinogre before. As you try to sneak away from the Zinogre, it spots you and rushes in to block your way. Startled, you fell on your 'arse'. You try to back away from the Zinogre which is now on top of you. The Zinogre looks around if anyone is watching, it then looks into you with a sudden, small smile. Whatever it's thinking about, you thought, I'm probably not going to like it.
113.title: Brock's Unlikely Encounters

1131.content:
The Zinogre lays you down on it's soft underbelly. As you were weighed down, you start to feel something wet and unpleasant. The Zinogre's very large penis sucks up yours, and the Zinogre starts humping! He goes on for a very long while, and you're not able to break free of his grasp, so you should enjoy it while it lasts. The Zinogre then howls with delight as his semen starts to enter your reproductive system, and he keeps on going. That's when things started to change, for you maybe. You start to have huge bulky claws, grow a canine like face, grow a long bulky tail, and some fur have started to appear on you. That is also when you started to grow as well. You grew so big that your clothes ripped apart. You then seem to understand what Zinogre was saying, "Awww yeah...it was a long while since I have raped a human." "I don't believe it!" you exclaimed in surprise, "You turned me into an anthro!" You then started to realize if that is what happened to the other humans who dared entered Lakefar. "That's right." the Zinogre said as he gets off your new, large body, "We monsters have been raping, cocking, and unbirthing humans for a long time, kind of like a sport." You sit down on your bottom as you understand him. "So that's why most of my species never came back." "Correct." he said as he turns around to the other part of the forest, "Well I better get going, look for more remaining humans to rape. We won't be able to meet again so, good luck in your new form." "Hey, wait!" you called him but it was too late as the Zinogre walks off.

As you were about to leave as well, your belly starts to growl. "Awww man," you said to yourself, "Being so big can sure make you hungry." "That's what I thought too." you heard a voice from behind. You turn around to see...
1131.title: Transformation

11311.content:
You see a female Nargacuga anthro laying down on a tree branch. She gets onto the ground with her hind feet. "I saw everything that happened." the Nargacuga said, "Especially the part when you were with a bunch of Gargwa's." "I was just observing them," you will say, "Who are you?" "Me?" the female narga asked, "My name is Mica. You?" "I'm Brock." you replied to her. Mica sits down, "So, I see you are going to hunt some herbivores." "That wasn't my plan but yes." You replied as your belly starts to growl even more. Mica looks around to find a very big acorn. She picks it up, and gives it to you. "Try to swallow this." She said. "Are you serious?" You said with a confused face, "You wanted me to eat this?" "Your not really going to eat it like chew and swallow," Mica said, "You need to gulp it down whole." She appears to be very serious. "But it's very big," you will say, "I don't think it's going to fit in my mouth." "You can swallow anything if you believe." Mica said. So you try putting it in your mouth. As you already know, it won't fit at all. "Try to unhitch your jaws." Mica said. You tried to shove the acorn farther. With a little success, unhitching the jaws made the acorn easier to put in your mouth. Then, you finally shoved the entire acorn into your very full mouth. "Now," Mica said, "Swallow the acorn." It sounds like a difficult procedure but you tried it. You gulped the acorn as your head was tilted up high. You feel a slight bulge in your esophagus as it falls into your stomach. "I did it!" You shouted out with a smile. "Great job!" Mica said, "Now get ready because we are going to hunt!" You follow Mica in search for herbivores to eat.

Exactly what kind of herbivore?
11311.title: A Helpful Situation

11531.content: Alex was wandering the woods, he didn’t intend for this to happen but his ship crashed and he couldn’t wait for rescue. So instead he rushed to get to the hub, he kept tripping as he ran, his heart fast hoping a monster wouldn’t find him. He thought the monster would just eat him or something, but what it would do was much worse. The wind flew past him, the grass crunched under him, the sun shown on him. Then he heard a terrifying roar, he stopped dead in his tracks and hastily looked around. He looked directly at the deadly tobi-kadachi, he actually heard about this monster, with it’s funny name and the descriptions given to him, he always thought it would be smaller. The tobi-kadachi had a large thick cock, that shimmered in the sunlight, Alex tripped backwards, his ass roughly hitting the ground, the creature dashed up to him, then stopped. The tobi slowly flipped him over like it was preparing a meal, then he got paralyzed, he couldn’t do anything as the monster bit off his clothes. He was quickly naked, this giant creature with a fat cock standing behind him, ready to fuck him.
11531.title: Tobi-Kadachi

132.content:
Your name is Tika, an explorer who loves hunting for treasure. You enter what appears to be a cave. Interested, you enter the cave in search for rare materials to sell to Monster Hunters. You find a small bone pile that appears to have a load of golden bones. A perfect opportunity, you thought to yourself. You gather lots of the shining remains, that is until you hear something. You look behind you to see a huge Gigginox. You make a tiny 'eep' as the giant leech wyvern turns around and sucks you into its reproductive tailhole. There you are covered in its stenchy egg sack becoming mutated as you become a Gigginox as well.

After a few minutes you became as large as the offender you are inside in. The Gigginox then pushes you out, slowly. After it releases you it walks off. You look at your own body as you have become mutated into a Gigginox Anthro. Well this was just great, you thought to yourself, I was just doing my own business and then I was transformed into an ugly leech! You start to feel a grumble in your stomach. You then think you should find something to eat. You went outside into an icy world, filled with arctic wildlife. You decided to prey on something, but which one?
132.title: Tika's Mutation

info.brief_description: You have been transformed into an anthro. Eat your prey, and have fun being a predator!
info.description:
In this story, you decide which monster you want to be. You will first be a human who goes on an adventure to an unknown continent known as Lakefar, and will either if male, get raped, cock vored, or unbirthed / or if you are a female, cock vored, or unbirthed by the monster you chose. Both these three things will turn you into the same monster.
Differences: Males who get raped will turn into a monster faster than getting cock vored or unbirthed, which require both male and female monsters to mate with each other, after that you will be on your own.
Rules:
You can vore some monsters that you will encounter, as long as its smaller.
Humans can appear in the story, but they cannot hunt you, nor you could rape or cock/unbirth, but you can either befriend one or swallow them, which ever you like.
The only way that you will die as an anthro is that you must be eaten by a larger monster.
You can sometimes swallow someone and let it stay if you want without digesting them.
You cannot mate with another monster, but you can also befriend one.

This story will keep on updating as more MH games come out soon. Until then, good luck!
